IITIIMShaadi
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Once 60% profile gets completed and documents uploaded, we shall activate your subscription. This shall enable search partner feature. Now, you can view matches relevant to your search criteria on age, caste, location, ctc etc. Of the total choices that system suggests, detailed profiles of top 10 members can be seen. You shall also be able to see full profiles of all paid members who match your criteria. A snapshot of rest of the profiles shall also be visible. This will give you a fairly good idea if this website is likely to be useful to you. Should you find the profiles of interest, You may choose premier membership or online paid membership in order to begin interaction with members of your preference.
Details of users referred by you for which Rs. 500 per user were credited to your account.
Each of your friend who signs up with your reference will receive ₹ 500 (USD 8) in their wallet being maintained by us. For each person you refer and s/he signs up with us as subscriber viewer*, we'll credit ₹ 500 (USD 8) to your account. There's no limit to how much credit you can earn. Credit can be used to avail any of our paid services, including premier services.
*Subscriber Viewer: completes all membership requirements
We remain intrigued on how much a resume and a photo add up to offer a realistic picture of an individual. Very little, right?
How else to decipher someone?
Perhaps a video.
This feature is likely to complement the decision making process while assessing a profile. Whats’ more - your passions, interests and hobbies can be tagged by you to make use of our pioneer IT leverage in the industry - tag based match making - where those results are featured where more interests match.
The smart ones will know the difference videos can make. Video wale dhulania le jayenge! How to Make Videos and Upload on Youtube There are several videos available on youtube that guide on how to make videos as well as how to upload them on youtube. You may avail this support as per your requirement. We are not looking for professional videos. May target to upload normal quality videos that we keep making in our day to day life. May use the link,https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/57407?hl=en to figure out uploading them on youtube. Note: Kindly ensure that content of video is socially acceptable and is not vulgar. Management’s decision remains final on acceptance of any uploaded video
#####FAQ section ###### We have penned down some of the common questions that we come across.
1. What is IITIIMShaadi.com? IITIIMShaadi.com is a matrimonial portal, only for the alumni of Premier Indian and international educational institutions.
2. Can only alumni of IIT and IIM register? Not really. We welcome profiles from various premier institutions in all disciplines, may it be Management, Engineering Social Work, Medicine, Finance, Law, Fashion Design, Theater, Media Communication and you name it.
3. How do I know if my institute is included in your list of premier institutions or not? a. Click on Register tab appearing on the home screen of the website. b. Click on either male or female. c. You shall get list of various disciplines (management, Engineering etc.) Choose the one applicable to you and see the list of shortlisted colleges identified for this purpose.
4. Is the list of colleges same for both males and females? No, the list is marginally relaxed for females. Most premier colleges have more than double the number of females and sometimes male to female ratio at premier institutions is 5:1. For Females, we have also included a select list of graduation colleges on all India basis. (Note: See Others under Indian and city)
5. How do you make sure that only genuine members register on this website? We obtain scanned copy of educational document (any document such as degree/diploma Certificate, I Card, web-link, final year mark sheet etc) at the time of registration. Submission of these documents is compulsory for any member before we activate his/her profile.
6. How do I access the database? Once you are an activated member (profile is complete and certificates are verified), you have access to the member database. You can fill in your own criteria on age, education, religion, caste and get to see profiles that meet your criteria.
7. Is it free to see database or one has to necessarily pay some fee to access same? There is no fee for browsing the database. However, if you wish to see detailed profiles of more than 10 members, you need to avail paid subscription. Also, if you wish to communicate with shortlisted profiles through private message or sending friend’s message, you need to be a paid member.
8. What if I am not a paid member and someone sends me a message or friend request. Can I reply to him/her without being a paid member? Yes, all our members can reply to a message or friend request even if they are not paid members.
9. Will the chances of other members viewing my profile go up if I am a paid member vis a vis staying as a free member? Yes, certainly. When any free member searches, s/he gets to see full profiles of all paid members as long as they fall within one’s search criteria.
10. How much is the fee to become a paid member? We present following options
Indian a. Rs. 5,000 + 18% GST = Rs. 5,900 (Validity:1 month from the date of payment) b. Rs. 10,000 + 18% GST = Rs. 11,800 (Validity:6 months from the date of payment) c. Rs. 15,000 + 18% GST = Rs. 17,700 (Validity:1 year from the date of payment) d. Rs. 25,000+ 18% GST = Rs. 29,550 (Validity:Lifetime Membership)
International a. USD 100 (Validity:1 month from the date of payment) b. USD 200 (Validity:6 months from the date of payment) c. USD 300 (Validity:1 year from the date of payment) d. USD 500 (Validity:Lifetime Membership)
11. I am looking for personalised support to search a match. Can you provide active support? Yes, you are welcome to avail our premier services, http://iitiimshaadi.com/premier-services/. This is handled by directors themselves. For full information, please write to us on premier@iitiimshaadi.com or call the founder director, Taksh at +91-9811199800
12. What if I am in final year of my education and I do not have certificates? We are happy to accept scanned copy of your ID card/latest transcripts.
13. I face the problem of uploading certificates and photographs on IITIIMShaadi.com... Kindly mail it to us at: documents@iitiimshaadi.com. We shall upload the photographs on your behalf and also verify the certificates.
14. Can my certificates be seen by others viewing my profile? No, they are required only for our internal verification.
15. Do you also suggest some matches based on a member’s profile? We advise you to fill up partner’s preference while filling up the form. IITIIM has developed software, called, 'Dhappa'. This software pulls out from the database the profiles that match requirements indicated by you. We send you the details of maximum two matching profiles every Friday. This service is available on a free of cost basis.
16. What if I am not able to find my college? No problem! You can mail us the details of both course and college at contact @iitiimshaadi.com. We shall review its ranking and confirm if we are in a position to include it in the list or not.
17. As a paid member can I get refund of fees for the unpaid period of my subscription term? Regret, there is no provision for refund of fee.
18. How large is your database? In all 30,000 plus individuals have registered their profiles. However, only 9000 have so far completed the eligibility requirement and they form database of activated members. As a result of promotion, database is growing up by 100 profiles every week. Being a niche site, we don’t ever expect a very large database. Our target is not to show you a large number of profiles. It is to show you extremely relevant ones.
19. I am a paid member. How to get contact numbers or email of other members? 1. You could send a Friend’s request to indicate your interest. The moment your friend request is accepted, you shall be able to view contact number and mail ID. Same is not visible for members who do not accept friend request. This is in accordance with our Privacy Policy. 2. Alternatively, you could evince your interest by writing a mail through the portal. You may like to mention your contact details in this mail. 3. You have the facility to check if your mail has been read or not (you see double tick like we see in whatsapp messages)
#### About Us Alma Mater Matters Pvt Ltd (IITIIMShaadi) – Exclusive Lounge to Explore Matrimonial Alliance Among Alumni of Premier Educational Institutions. Founders Taksh Gupta – Management Graduate from SP Jain School of Global Management. Author of Love @ 365 kmph and Hiraeth: First Love First Contact Dr. Ajay Gupta – PhD from Delhi School of Economics and Post Graduate from IRMA. Alumni of Premier Education Institutions deservedly desire companionship of the ‘matching intellect’, with similar experiences and expectations. This portal addresses the tailor-made needs of this segment. Registration Requirement Fundamentally we invite registration from alumni of top few Indian and Global Institutions irrespective of the field of study. We wish to cover Engineering, Management, Architecture, Medicine, Finance, Law, Fashion Design, Theater, Media Communication, Psychology, Sociology, Music, Dance , Culinary Arts, Historic Preservation, Animal Psychology and you name it. Senior Government Officers are also included. An indicative list of such institutions has been listed in the eligibility criteria. This list by no means is comprehensive and being updated on a periodic basis. Your suggestions in this regard are more than welcome.
### Success Stories#### Hello,
 I would like to deactivate my account since I have found my perfect match through iitiimshaadi.com.
 Thanks for providing a great platfor40m to help me find us find each other.
 Bride: Engineering Graduate from IIIT Hyderabad
 Groom: Masters from Carnegie Mellon University
 Mail Received on 1st March, 2017 Dear Sir/Mam,
 Thanks for your services. I have found my match through iitiimshaadi.com. Please delete my profile now. Please confirm once you delete the profile.
 Thanks & regards, XYZ Hi,
 Thanks IITIIMShaadi.com for helping me finding right soul mate. It is really a good platform where you can get your partner as per your choice. Thanks Ajay and Swati for stepping down to my home and meeting us. It was a great meeting with you guys.
 Thanks and Regards,XYZ Hi,
 Please close my profile as I have found my life partner on your portal. Thanks and Regards,XYZ
Bride: Engineering Graduate from DCE Groom: Masters from BITS Pilani Mail Received on 2nd April, 2016 Hi Swati,
 Thanks a lot for your wishes. Yes as a matter of fact, we found a match for her through iitiim website only.Its just that we wish not to publicize it on the website. Our experience with you guys has been awesome. Unlike other matrimonial websites, we were not over burdened by hundreds of profiles and hence it made our search very convenient after putting up the filters. Kudos to you and your team for the great work.
 Mail from Bride's Father
 Bride: Management Graduate from IIM Udaipur and Purdue University, USA
 Groom: Management Graduate from ISB Hyderabad
 Mail Received on 22nd January, 2016 Hi Swati,
 I have some good news! I found my life partner on iitiimshaadi.com 
 We want to thank you and your entire team for putting us in touch with each other. Kindly delete both of our profiles. Cheers
 Bride: Management Graduate from Fore School of Management
 Groom: Management Graduate from Rotman School of Management University of Toronto
 Mail received on 29th November, 2015 Hey,
 I got my partner using your website. Now kindly delete my profile. Thank you.
Bride: IIM Kozhikode Groom: IIM Kolkata Mail received on 9th November, 2015 Hi Swati,
 I have some good news! I don't know about other success stories of iitiimshaadi..but here is one! And it's my own :) I found my partner on your portal and we connected/met online in nov,14. I live in Nigeria and was struggling to find the right person for the past many years. But after we spoke and got to know each other I came over to India in March and got engaged! The wedding is planned for the 18th of June,15. We are both really excited and thank the iitiimshaadi team for putting us together! Hitching us essentially:) We don't feel that this is an arranged marriage..we found love online! All the very best to your team to put more hearts together! Cheers! Bride: Management Graduate from IIM, Lucknow Groom: Management Graduate from IIFT Married on 18th June, 2015 Hi,
 Wish to take this opportunity to thank you. I met my soulmate through your site . Please delete my profile from your website.
 Warm Regards 
 Bride: Qualified Company Secretary and Law Graduate from National Law School, Bangalore
 Groom: Management Graduate from XLRI
 Married on 5th June, 2015 Hi team,
 Could you please remove my profile from your site? I have found my match and have been happily married. Thanks, by the way I found my match on your site only, so would like to thank your team!
 Management Graduate from IIM Kozhikode
 Management Graduate from XLRI Jamshedpur and Engineering Graduate from NIT Allahabad
 Mail Received on 25th July, 2016
### Intro slider ##### Who Can Register ?

 Alumni of top few Indian and Global Institutions (Management, Engineering, Architecture, Medicine, Mass Communication, CA/CS/ICWA/CFA, Fashion Design & many more) Total numbers of members - 40,000

 Active monthly database - 10,000

 200 people found their match How to Connect ?

 Send Messages/Friend Request
 View phone number
 OR
 Adopt personalised services ### Privacy Policy #####
Note: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time based on your comments or as a result of a change of policy in our company. In case we do not receive any response, it will be assumed that you have understood the privacy policy and good with it. If you have any questions/concerns regarding our Privacy Statement, please write in to support@iitiimshaadi.com It may be noted that the website IITIIMShaadi.com, promoted by Alma Mater Matters Pvt Ltd is purely to facilitate matchmaking among better educated section of the society. We have attempted to take certain precautions to offer you meaningful database. However, the organization does not accept any legal responsibility or risk originating from wrong or inaccurate data presented by any of the member(s).
